amendment.description: A bill to improve provisions relating to certification and flight standards for military remotely piloted aerial systems in the National Airspace System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 32 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 32 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S538; text: CR S538) A bill to improve provisions relating to certification and flight standards for military remotely piloted aerial systems in the National Airspace System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 32 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 32 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Ensign.
